name: Piper’s Pet Cafe
description:
Mysteries? Renovations? Cute pets? Solitaire? YES! Join Piper and her beloved corgi Bean for pet cafe renovations, traveling the world, and solving mysteries when an opportunity to open a pet cafe by an eccentric benefactor turns into far more than she bargained for!
Discover a compelling, ongoing story with new locations to renovate, new people and pets, and new mysteries to discover.
CREATE - Renovate and makeover unique pet cafes around the world. Can you help make them successful?
SOLVE - Unlimited challenging solitaire puzzles!
DISCOVER - New worldwide cafe locations, characters, and mysteries with regular updates.
PETS - Meet a variety of memorable pets and wild animals from all around the world!
MYSTERY - Why did Piper’s benefactor choose her? Each cafe has its own local mystery to solve.
FRIENDS (and Foes) - From her childhood friend to those she meets on her pet cafe-renovating adventures, Piper will meet a cast of unique characters to help or try to foil her hard work!
ROMANCE - Will Piper and her childhood friend rekindle their romance? Or will they find love with others?
Do you have what it takes to help Piper create the world’s best pet cafes?
